Phrase mining is a fundamental task of text analysis that extracts high-quality phrases from a text corpus.
.
It improves computational models for many applications.
.
The applications are information extraction, information retrieval, taxonomy construction, and topic modeling. We will use topic modeling in the next quarter.
.
